targets.query: SELECT last("rx_dbm"), last("tx_dbm") FROM "OPTIC" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$rtr$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "LINKNAME", "lane_number"
SELECT mean("tx_dbm") as TX FROM "OPTIC" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "LINKNAME" =~ /^$ifname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY lane_number, time(30s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("tx_high_warn") as HIGH_WARN, mean("tx_low_warn") as LOW_WARN FROM "OPTIC" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "LINKNAME" =~ /^$ifname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("rx_dbm") as RX FROM "OPTIC" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "LINKNAME" =~ /^$ifname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY lane_number, time(30s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("rx_high_warn") as HIGH_WARN, mean("rx_low_warn") as LOW_WARN FROM "OPTIC" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "LINKNAME" =~ /^$ifname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("current_bias") as BIAS FROM "OPTIC" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "LINKNAME" =~ /^$ifname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY lane_number, time(30s) fill(null)
SELECT mean("current_temp") as Temperture  FROM "OPTIC" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "LINKNAME" =~ /^$ifname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s) fill(null)

SELECT mean("in_block_errors_rate") as BLOCK_ERROR, mean("in_crc_errors_rate") as CRC_ERROR FROM "OPTIC" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "LINKNAME" =~ /^$ifname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s) fill(0)

SELECT mean("in_block_errors_rate") as BLOCK_ERROR, mean("in_crc_errors_rate") as CRC_ERROR FROM "OPTIC" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "LINKNAME" =~ /^$ifname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s) fill(0)

SELECT mean("in_block_errors_rate") as BLOCK_ERROR, mean("in_crc_errors_rate") as CRC_ERROR FROM "OPTIC" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "LINKNAME" =~ /^$ifname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30s) fill(0)

SELECT mean("in_frames_64_octets_rate") as "64_Bytes",  mean("in_frames_65_127_octets_rate") as "65_127_Bytes", mean("in_frames_128_255_octets_rate") as "128_255_Bytes", mean("in_frames_256_511_octets_rate") as "256_511_Bytes", mean("in_frames_512_1023_octets_rate") as "512_1023_Bytes", mean("in_frames_1024_1518_octets_rate") as "1024_1518_Bytes" FROM "OPTIC" WHERE ("device" =~ /^$rtr$/ AND "LINKNAME" =~ /^$ifname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP by time(30s)

list.definition: show tag values from OPTIC with key="device"
list.label: Router
list.name: rtr
list.query: show tag values from OPTIC with key="device"

list.definition: show tag values with key="LINKNAME" where device=~/$rtr/
list.label: Phy. Port
list.name: ifname
list.query: show tag values with key="LINKNAME" where device=~/$rtr/
